newsitem.title: USA: Texaco Calif. alkylation unit remains down.
newsitem.headline: Texaco Calif. alkylation unit remains down.

text.p: Texaco Inc Tuesday said the 9,000 barrel-per-day (bpd) alkylation unit remained down at its 100,000 bpd refinery in Wilmington, Calif., following a fire on Monday.
The fire's cause and duration of shutodown were undetermined, the spokesman said.
The unit processes butane and propane gases for the production of higher-octane gasolines.
The spokesman declined to say how the shutdown would effect shipments to customers, but added the company would continue to supply them.
"I don't want to go into the various ways to secure supplies," he said.
